h1: How Many Calories in Chick-fil-A Spicy Chicken Sandwich?
assumptions: Standard Chick-fil-A menu item: spicy breaded chicken breast fillet, toasted bun, dill pickles; no customizations or sides.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and custom orders. Values based on official Chick-fil-A data; check app or site for latest.

quick_answer.text: One Chick-fil-A Spicy Chicken Sandwich contains 440 calories with 28 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Grilled chicken instead of spicy breaded

faqs.q: How many calories in a Chick-fil-A spicy chicken sandwich?
What is the protein in Chick-fil-A spicy chicken sandwich?
faqs.a: About 28 g of protein per sandwich.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in Chick-fil-A spicy chicken sandwich?
faqs.a: Around 1900 mg of sodium, so watch intake if on a low-sodium diet.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in Chick-fil-A spicy chicken sandwich?
faqs.a: Yes, 44 g total carbs, including 2 g fiber and 5 g sugars from the bun and pickles.

faqs.q: How does spicy chicken sandwich compare to regular at Chick-fil-A?
faqs.a: Spicy version has similar calories (440 vs. 440) but more spice from peppers in breading.
